entry.title: Whispers in the Blood
entry.summary:
Author: DancingTearsSuou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,274Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Beacon Hills University is haunted—by shadows, by secrets, and by a series of brutal murders mimicking infamous urban legends. Derek Hale, a brooding new student with a mysterious past, and Stiles Stilinski, a sarcastic journalism major with a knack for uncovering dark truths, are drawn into a chilling web of horror. As the bodies pile up, so do the secrets, and their unlikely bond becomes the only constant in a world unraveling.

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,966Chapters: 8/19Kudos: 314

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.”   Stiles stares at him.   “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?”   “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away.  Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.title: Mystic Secrets
entry.summary:
Author: DancingTearsSuou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,736Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Stiles Salvatore, long thought dead, returns to Mystic Falls following Damon Salvatore’s decision to come home. A vampire with a mysterious past and sharp intellect, Stiles has spent decades hiding in the shadows, distancing himself from the brothers who once defined his existence. But now, with Damon back and strange omens whispering through the town, Stiles has no choice but to return to the place where everything began.

entry.title: Moonlight and Hellmouth
entry.summary:
Author: DancingTearsSuou

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,615Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 2

Summary: In the town of Beacon Hills—better known in certain supernatural circles as the new Hellmouth—a teenage boy named Stiles Stilinski discovers that he is the next in a long line of supernatural warriors: a Slayer. Gifted with enhanced strength, reflexes, and prophetic dreams, Stiles is chosen to battle the dark forces of the night. But he isn’t alone.When Derek Hale, a brooding and mysterious vampire with a tormented past, returns to Beacon Hills, he is drawn to the new Slayer for reasons he doesn’t understand—and instincts he tries to resist. Bound together by fate, the two must navigate ancient prophecies, bloodthirsty demons, and their increasingly complicated feelings for each other.

entry.title: DOUBLESPEAK & SUBTERFUGE
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,678Chapters: 20/20Kudos: 32

Summary: After a series of events are erased from public memory, Stiles returns to Beacon Hills Prep with a fractured reputation and a growing power. Meanwhile Scott is having trouble reconciling the pressure and expectations from his estranged fathers–Rafael–sudden return.As the school restructures and supernatural tensions rise, old alliances are tested, new leaders emerge, and hidden agendas begin to surface. With friendships strained and the political balance shifting, Stiles and Scott are drawn deeper into a world of rituals, legacy, and dangerous expectations. Stiles also begins training under a reluctant mentor when he uncovers truths about the past and his role in a future that others are quietly trying to shape.Meanwhile, forces inside and outside the school maneuver to gain control, and the line between protector and pawn begins to blur. When violence erupts and loyalties are tested, Stiles must decide who he is, who he stands with, and what he’s willing to become to survive what’s coming next.Some power is inherited. Some is stolen. But the most dangerous kind? The uncontrollable.

entry.title: time fuckery
entry.summary:
Author: whimsicalmeerkat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,397Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 106

Summary: Stiles plunges through the preserve, hoping he hasn’t somehow gotten lost in these woods he’s very familiar with and that the light holds long enough to get him to his destination. He can tell the forest is younger than the one he left behind, so he knows he truly did travel back in time. Go him; he’s done with the part that almost everyone else would think is the hardest. Stiles knows the really hard part is still to come—getting Derek to trust him enough to believe Stiles when he warns him about Kate.~Stiles travels back in time to warn the Hales about Kate and prevent tragedy. Things go differently than he expects.

entry.title: The Binding of Stiles
entry.summary:
Author: GrimReaperlover11

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,898Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 616

Summary: A witch decides to take revenge against Talia Hale by summoning a demon to harm her child, however the spell goes wrong and instead of having her child harmed by the demon...the demon is instead bound to the infant...leaving Talia in the rare situation of now having a demon babysitter for her son.Mieczyslaw hates witches. The fact that one was so incompetent to summon him to harm ad child and instead ripped his free will away from him, binding him to the infant, forcing him to do whatever he is commanded by his new charge...it's beyond infuriating. Now he must figure out how to break the spell while also playing Hell Nanny to the infant son of an alpha werewolf

entry.title: Blood Under Moonlight
entry.summary:
Author: JubalOfFallenRam

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,534Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 18

Summary: After being kidnapped, tortured, and subjected to inhumane experiments, Stiles emerges as a hybrid—something no longer entirely human. Traumatised and desperate, he flees to New York, putting as much distance as possible between himself and the nightmare he escaped. Struggling to cope with the aftermath, he spirals into substance abuse, seeking refuge in a dangerous addiction. he meets Amber, a Fae - who extends a hand not just to help him heal, but to guide him through the grief of his own death. With her, Stiles begins to face what he’s become. "I'm a mess," Stiles said, his voice heavy with misery."I know... but you're my mess," Derek said softly, pulling Stiles closer into their embrace.

entry.title: I knew you were trouble
entry.summary:
Author: norman123

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,700Chapters: 16/18Kudos: 167

Summary: Derek has never been particularly interested in Peter’s personal life, but when his uncle returns from Canada with a new "husband," he realizes—this is a disaster.Stiles is too loud, too bold, and far too good at getting in his way.Derek is certain that there’s something off about this "marriage," but the more he watches Stiles, the harder it becomes to ignore that anger isn’t the only thing he feels.What if he isn’t furious because Stiles became part of their family—but because he didn’t become part of his life?

entry.title: Third Time's The Charm
entry.summary:
Author: novasillies

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 206,672Chapters: 16/46Kudos: 107

Summary: "You're a person people are better off without."Theo's words struck hard and deep. The claws of them dug in and twisted, mangled him relentlessly."That's not on me."-Stiles goes back in time again to stop the Hale House fire. It rings true for the rest of his life that he seems to break more than he fixes.Updates! Every! Thursday! Except for when it doesn’t (back from hiatus! :))
